module.name: The Power of the 5 Mexican Spanish Pure Vowels
module.description: Master the essential five pure vowels fundamental to Mexican Spanish pronunciation
module.focus_area: vowel clarity and pure vowel sounds
module.feedback_focus: Pay special attention to vowel clarity. Spanish has 5 pure vowels (a, e, i, o, u) that should sound crisp and consistent, unlike English vowels which often reduce to 'uh'. Focus on maintaining clear, distinct vowel sounds throughout your speech.

L1.name: Vowel Intro - Single Words
L1.description: Practice individual vowel sounds in isolation
L1.prompt: Record yourself clearly pronouncing words that highlight each vowel sound: /a/ as in 'casas', /e/ as in 'diferente', /i/ as in 'ahí', /o/ as in 'Córdoba', /u/ as in 'antigüa'. Focus on making each vowel sound pure and distinct.

L2.name: Shadowing - La Mulata
L2.description: Shadow segments from La Mulata de Córdoba
L2.prompt: After listening to the La Mulata segment, record yourself rephrasing the message in your own words. Focus on maintaining clear vowel sounds as you speak naturally.

L3.name: Mini-Script - Your Story
L3.description: Create and record your own transformation story inspired by La Mulata
L3.prompt: Record your 5-line mini-script about a challenging situation where hope and creativity open the door to freedom. Speak naturally while maintaining clear, pure Spanish vowels throughout.

L4.name: Final Challenge
L4.description: Connect La Mulata's story to your personal experience
L4.prompt: Think about how one of the phrases from La Mulata connects with your life. Record a 20-40 second response sharing your reflection. Speak naturally, self-correct if needed, and focus on clear vowel pronunciation.
L4.feedback_emphasis: overall vowel clarity and natural expression
